ASSEMBLY CODE: 

ADDI R1, R1, 0x5
ADDI R2, R2, 0xA
ADDI R3, R3, 0xFFF
ADDI R4, R4, 0xC00 // these will sign extend

MUL 	R5, R3, R4 
MULH 	R6, R3, R4 
MULHSU 	R7, R1, R4
MULHU 	R8, R2, R3

DIV 	R9, R2, R1
DIVU 	R10, R4, R1

REM 	R11, R2, R1 
REMU 	R12, R3, R1 

----------------------------------------------

MACHINE CODE: 

000000000101 00001 000 00001 0010011 
000000001010 00010 000 00010 0010011 
111111111111 00011 000 00011 0010011 
110000000000 00100 000 00100 0010011 

0000001 00100 00011 000 00101 0110011 
0000001 00100 00011 001 00110 0110011 
0000001 00100 00001 010 00111 0110011 
0000001 00011 00010 011 01000 0110011 

0000001	00001 00010 100 01001 0110011 
0000001 00001 00100 101 01010 0110011 

0000001 00001 00010 110 01011 0110011 
0000001 00001 00011 111 01100 0110011
